messages.subject: Tom Cruise movies
messages.msgSnippet: ****1999: Eyes Wide Shut I know some will disagree, but I couldn t live with myself unless I spoke up: This was the Worst Movie Ever. It was so boring that
messages.messageBody:
****1999: Eyes Wide Shut

I know some will disagree, but I couldn't live with myself unless I
spoke
up: This was the Worst Movie Ever. It was so boring that Craig and I
fast
forwarded, trying to find anything slightly titillating.

Paula****

Paula, I have to agree with you on this! TERRIBLE movie!!! My husband
and I actually watched the whole thing waiting for it to get better,
never happened.
I'm sorry that Stanley Kubrik's last movie was his worst - but he leaves
a legacy of some really good ones.
